short_summary: Multiple Victoria-Class Spares : Inhibitors, Tube Sub-Assembly, Switches, Coils and Microphones
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below...
duration_in_months: You can view the bid schedule details on posted documents
full_summary:
#**Tender Announcement - Multiple Victoria-Class Spares**
## Request for Proposal  
### Solicitation Number: *W8482-230634/B*  
### Solicitation Date: *2023-01-25*  
### Closing Date: *2023-03-22T14:00:00* 

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply of various spares for Victoria-Class Ships, details of which are outlined below:

| Line | Product Name                  | NIHS          | NSN             | Quantity | Unit    | Location     |
|------|-------------------------------|---------------|-----------------|----------|---------|--------------|
| 1     | Inhibitor Plate               | *5820*         | *99-7785099*    | *3*       | *EA*     | *CFB Esquimalt* |
| 2     | Inhibitor Plate               | *5820*         | *99-7785099*    | *3*       | *EA*     | *CFB Halifax* |
| 7     | Push Switch                   | *5930*         | *99-5480689*    | *15*      | *EA*     | *CFB Esquimalt* |
| 8     | Push Switch                   | *5930*         | *99-5480689*    | *10*      | *EA*     | *CFB Halifax* |
| 14    | Earphone Pad Cover            | *5965*         | *99-9546812*    | *200*     | *PR*     | *CFB Esquimalt* |
| 18    | Electronic Buzzer             | *6350*         | *99-6224510*    | *10*      | *EA*     | *CFB Esquimalt* |
| 19    | Electronic Buzzer             | *6350*         | *99-6224510*    | *7*       | *EA*     | *CFB Halifax* |
| 20    | Headset-Microphone             | *5965*         | *99-5316629*    | *15*      | *EA*     | *CFB Esquimalt* |
| 21    | Headset-Microphone             | *5965*         | *99-5316629*    | *10*      | *EA*
